00035 enum uvm_ml_stream_kind_e
00036 {
00037     UVM_ML_STREAM_NULL = 0,
00038     UVM_ML_STREAM_TYPED_OBJECT,
00039     UVM_ML_STREAM_RAW,
00040     UVM_ML_STREAM_STRING
00041 };

00043 bp_api_struct         * uvm_ml_config_handler::m_bp_provided_api = NULL;
00044 uvm_ml_config_handler * uvm_ml_config_rsrc::m_config_handler     = NULL;

00052     uvm_component(nm)

00060 uvm_ml_config_handler::uvm_ml_config_handler(sc_core::sc_module_name nm, bp_api_struct * bp_provided_api) :
00061     uvm_component(nm)
00062 {
00063     m_bp_provided_api = bp_provided_api;
00064     uvm_register_config_callback(this);
00065     uvm_register_rsrc_callback(this);
00066 }

00072 uvm_ml_config_handler::~uvm_ml_config_handler()
00073 {
00074     uvm_unregister_config_callback(this);
00075 }

00087 void uvm_ml_config_handler::config_callback(std::string cntxt, std::string inst_name, std::string field_name, uvm_resource_base * rsrc)
00088 {
00089     process_frmw_notification(UVM_CONFIG_SET, inst_name, field_name, rsrc, cntxt);
00090 }   // config_callback
00091

00094 
00101 void uvm_ml_config_handler::rsrc_callback(uvm_rsrc_action action, std::string scope, std::string name, uvm_resource_base * rsrc)
00102 {
00103     process_frmw_notification(action, scope, name, rsrc);
00104 }   // rsrc_callback
00105 
00106 void uvm_ml_config_handler::process_frmw_notification(uvm_rsrc_action action, std::string scope, std::string name, uvm_resource_base * rsrc, std::string cntxt)
00107 {
00108     uvm_resource<string>              * rsrc_str;
00109     uvm_resource<uvm_object *>        * rsrc_obj;
00110     uvm_resource<sc_dt::sc_bv_base >  * rsrc_int;
00111     std::string                         str_val;
00112     uvm_object *                        obj_val;
00113     int                                 nbits;
00114     //sc_dt::sc_bv<4096>                  bv_val;
00115 
00116     if (bp_set_config)
00117     {
00118         bp_set_config = false;
00119         return;
00120     }
00121 
00122     //if (uvm_ml_in_export_notify_resource != 0) // VY: Do not send back the notification received from the backplane
00123     //return;
00124     uvm_ml_packed_obj & packed_obj = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo();
00125     sc_core::sc_time current_time  = sc_core::sc_time_stamp();
00126     double           time_sec      = current_time.to_seconds();
00127     unsigned         framework_id  = uvm_ml_utils::FrameworkId();
00128     uvm_ml_packer_int packer;
00129 
00130     if (rsrc->get_value_type_id() == typeid(std::string))
00131     {
00132         rsrc_str = DCAST<uvm_resource<string> *>(rsrc);
00133         if (rsrc_str == NULL)
00134         {
00135             cout << "ERROR: config_callback DCAST to string is NULL, should never happen!!" << endl;
00136         }
00137         else
00138         {
00139             str_val = rsrc_str->read();
00140             packer << UVM_ML_STREAM_STRING;
00141             packer << str_val;
00142             packer.fill_uvm_ml_packed_obj(&packed_obj);
00143 
00144 
00145             if (UVM_CONFIG_SET)
00146                 (*m_bp_provided_api->notify_config_ptr)(framework_id, cntxt.c_str(), scope.c_str(), name.c_str(), packed_obj.size, packed_obj.val, (uvm_ml_time_unit) sc_core::SC_SEC, time_sec);
00147             else
00148                 (*m_bp_provided_api->notify_resource_ptr)(framework_id, (uvm_ml_resource_notify_action) action, scope.c_str(), name.c_str(), scope.c_str(), packed_obj.size, packed_obj.val, (uvm_ml_time_unit) sc_core::SC_SEC, time_sec);
00149 
00150         }
00151     }
00152     else if (rsrc->get_value_type_id() == typeid(uvm_object*))
00153     {
00154         rsrc_obj = DCAST<uvm_resource<uvm_object *> *>(rsrc);
00155         if (rsrc_obj == NULL)
00156         {
00157             cout << "ERROR: config_callback DCAST to uvm_object * is NULL, should never happen!!" << endl;
00158         }
00159         else
00160         {
00161             obj_val = rsrc_obj->read();
00162             uvm_ml_packer_pack(obj_val, &packed_obj);
00163 
00164             if (UVM_CONFIG_SET)
00165                 (*m_bp_provided_api->notify_config_ptr)(framework_id, cntxt.c_str(), scope.c_str(), name.c_str(), packed_obj.size, packed_obj.val, (uvm_ml_time_unit) sc_core::SC_SEC, time_sec);
00166             else
00167                 (*m_bp_provided_api->notify_resource_ptr)(framework_id, (uvm_ml_resource_notify_action) action, scope.c_str(), name.c_str(), scope.c_str(), packed_obj.size, packed_obj.val, (uvm_ml_time_unit) sc_core::SC_SEC, time_sec);
00168 
00169         }
00170     }
00171     else if (rsrc->get_value_type_id() == typeid(sc_dt::sc_bv_base))
00172     {
00173         rsrc_int = DCAST<uvm_resource<sc_dt::sc_bv_base > *>(rsrc);
00174         if (rsrc_int == NULL)
00175         {
00176             cout << "ERROR: config_callback DCAST to sc_dt::sc_bv * is NULL, should never happen!!" << endl;
00177         }
00178         else
00179         {
00180             nbits = rsrc_int->get_nbits();
00181 
00182             sc_dt::sc_bv_base bv_val(nbits);
00183             bv_val = rsrc_int->read();
00184             packer << UVM_ML_STREAM_RAW;
00185             packer << bv_val;
00186             packer.fill_uvm_ml_packed_obj(&packed_obj);
00187 
00188             if (UVM_CONFIG_SET)
00189                 (*m_bp_provided_api->notify_config_ptr)(framework_id, cntxt.c_str(), scope.c_str(), name.c_str(), packed_obj.size, packed_obj.val, (uvm_ml_time_unit) sc_core::SC_SEC, time_sec);
00190             else
00191                 (*m_bp_provided_api->notify_resource_ptr)(framework_id, (uvm_ml_resource_notify_action) action, scope.c_str(), name.c_str(), scope.c_str(), packed_obj.size, packed_obj.val, (uvm_ml_time_unit) sc_core::SC_SEC, time_sec);
00192         }
00193     }
00194 
00195 }   // process_frmw_notification

00202 void uvm_ml_config_rsrc::Initialize(bp_api_struct *bp_provided_api)
00203 {
00204     m_config_handler = new uvm_ml_config_handler("Config_Handler", bp_provided_api);
00205 
00206 }   // Initialize()

00211 
00220 void uvm_ml_config_rsrc::notify_config
00221 (
00222     const char *     cntxt,
00223     const char *     instance_name,
00224     const char *     field_name,
00225     unsigned int     stream_size,
00226     uvm_ml_stream_t  stream,
00227     uvm_ml_time_unit time_unit,
00228     double           time_value
00229 )
00230 {
00231     process_bp_notification(UVM_ML_CONFIG_SET, instance_name, field_name, stream_size, stream, time_unit, time_value, cntxt); 
00232 
00233 }   // notify_config
00234 
00235 int uvm_ml_config_rsrc::notify_resource
00236 (
00237     uvm_ml_resource_notify_action action,
00238     const char *                  item_scope,
00239     const char *                  item_name,
00240     const char *                  accessor_name,
00241     unsigned int                  stream_size,
00242     uvm_ml_stream_t               stream,
00243     uvm_ml_time_unit              time_unit,
00244     double                        time_value
00245 )
00246 {
00247     string cntxt = "";
00248     process_bp_notification(action, item_scope, item_name, stream_size, stream, time_unit, time_value); 
00249     return 1;
00250 
00251 }   // notify_resource
00252 
00253 void uvm_ml_config_rsrc::process_bp_notification
00254 (
00255     uvm_ml_resource_notify_action action,
00256     const char *                  item_scope,
00257     const char *                  item_name,
00258     unsigned int                  stream_size,
00259     uvm_ml_stream_t               stream,
00260     uvm_ml_time_unit              time_unit,
00261     double                        time_value,
00262     const char *                  cntxt
00263 )
00264 {
00265     unsigned int         data_size = stream_size - UVM_ML_BLOCK_SIZE;
00266     std::string          str_val;
00267     uvm_object *         obj_val;
00268     sc_dt::sc_bv_base    bv_val((int) data_size);
00269     std::vector<unsigned> vec;
00270     uvm_ml_packer_int  packer;
00271 
00272     bp_set_config = true;
00273     uvm_ml_stream_t stream_data = stream;
00274 
00275     uvm_ml_packed_obj&  packed_obj = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo();
00276 
00277 
00278     // ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00279 
00280     switch (stream[0])
00281     {
00282     case UVM_ML_STREAM_STRING:
00283         stream_data++;
00284         uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(packed_obj, data_size, stream_data);
00285         packer.set_from_uvm_ml_packed_obj(&packed_obj);
00286         packer >> str_val;
00287         call_db(action, cntxt, item_scope, item_name, str_val);
00288         break;
00289 
00290     case UVM_ML_STREAM_TYPED_OBJECT:
00291         uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(packed_obj, stream_size, stream);
00292         packer.set_from_uvm_ml_packed_obj(&packed_obj);
00293         packer >> obj_val;
00294         call_db(action, cntxt, item_scope, item_name, obj_val);
00295         break;
00296 
00297     case UVM_ML_STREAM_RAW:
00298         stream_data++;
00299         uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(packed_obj, data_size, stream_data);
00300         packer.set_from_uvm_ml_packed_obj(&packed_obj);
00301         packer >> bv_val;
00302         call_db(action, cntxt, item_scope, item_name, bv_val);
00303         break;
00304 
00305     default:
00306         break;
00307     };
00308 
00309     //EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00310 
00311 }   // process_bp_notification()
00312

00314 }   // namespace
